content: the crochet cupcake gnome pattern is the latest addition to our gnome collection perfect for summer party decor to bring some fun and joy > > the free pattern is available h ere 1 crochet yourself an adorable summer gnome and why not add a few more to the pool party you can pair your cupcake gnome with these summer gnomes as well 1 the watermelon gnome pattern 2 the ice cream gnome pattern 3 beach girl gnome pattern with a floaty the listing is for the crochet pattern not an actual toy the pattern is written in english with us crochet terms materials - sport/ fine or dk weight yarn - b hook or 2 5mm hook - polyfiber fill for stuffing - a keychain ring optional if you want your gnome to be the same size as mine and can t find the same yarn i suggest you use a dk double knit weight yarn with a 2 25mm or 2 5mm crochet hook 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/cupcake-gnome-the-crochet-summer-gnome/
